story_prompt: 请给讲一个小男孩森林奇幻故事

scenes.text: 暮色低垂的森林里，十岁男孩小杰迷路了。他的运动鞋踩碎落叶时，突然发现前方有星星点点的蓝光跃动——那是群通体透明的萤火精灵，正环绕着一株巨大的发光蘑菇旋转。蘑菇顶端的荧光孢子像蒲公英般悬浮，在潮湿空气里画出荧光轨迹。
scenes.image_prompt: A young boy in a green hoodie stands in a dim forest at twilight. Translucent glowing firefly-like creatures orbit a bioluminescent giant mushroom. Spores float like silver confetti in humid air, illuminated cobalt blue. Ethereal glow outlines the ancient trees.

scenes.text: 跟着萤火精灵深入森林腹地，小杰来到瀑布后的水晶洞穴。水帘后方的洞窟墙壁爬满发光苔藓，中央石台上沉睡着水晶狐狸——它雪白皮毛嵌着星图般的蓝晶斑纹，尾巴尖的宝石正散发脉动微光。当小杰触碰宝石的瞬间，整座洞穴突然响起远古的吟唱。
scenes.image_prompt: Crystalline cavern behind a waterfall glows with luminescent moss. A translucent fox-shaped crystal statue lies on a pedestal, its tail gem pulses cobalt light. Water droplets create rainbow mist in the air. The walls shimmer with geodes and quartz formations.

scenes.text: 黎明前的幻象里，水晶狐狸化作人形少女向小杰诉说：她是森林的守卫者，被邪恶巫术封印千年。当男孩将宝石归还她的心口，整个森林瞬间苏醒！树梢绽开彩虹花海，每片叶子都闪烁着微光，而归途上的小杰衣袋里，多了一片会呼吸的发光枫叶作为纪念。
scenes.image_prompt: Dawn breaking over an enchanted forest where trees have iridescent blossoms. A humanoid fox spirit with crystalline fur stands beside a boy who holds a glowing maple leaf. Sunlight filters through kaleidoscopic petals, creating prismatic projections on the ground. Glowing fireflies form a portal in the background.
